entry.title: 2001. Number of Pairs of Interchangeable Rectangles
entry.content:
解1.
import java.math.BigInteger;

class Solution {    public long interchangeableRectangles(int[][] rectangles) {        long count = 0;        HashMap<String, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();        for (int[] rectangle : rectangles) {            int gcd = BigInteger.valueOf(rectangle[0]).gcd(BigInteger.valueOf(rectangle[1])).intValue();            String key = rectangle[0] / gcd + " " + rectangle[1] / gcd;            count += map.getOrDefault(key, 0);            map.put(key, 1 + map.getOrDefault(key, 0));        }        return count;    }}

解2.
class Solution {
public long interchangeableRectangles(int[][] rectangles) {
Comparator<int[]> c = new Comparator<int[]>(){
public int compare(int[] a, int[] b){
return Long.compare((long)a[0] * b[1], (long)b[0] * a[1]);
}
};
Arrays.sort(rectangles, c);
int times = 0;
long ans = 0;
for(int i = 0; i < rectangles.length; i++){
if(i != rectangles.length-1 && c.compare(rectangles[i], rectangles[i+1]) == 0){
times++;
ans += times;
}
else{
times = 0;
}
}
return ans;
}
}
